content:
# Welcome point – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/category/welcome-point/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:35

Welcome point

Welcome point

Your first contact point at the AGH University of Krakow AGH University looks forward to hosting you! At our Welcome Point, we are happy to provide you with direct and individual information and advice on non-academic topics such as immigration…
Read more..

Where to find us

Our Welcome Point is located on: 30 Mickiewicza Avenue, 30-059 Kraków building C-1, 1st floor, room number 108. Does not ring a bell? Take a look at the map here –> The opening hours are: 7:30 – 15:30 from Monday until Friday.
Read more..

Contact details

If you cannot visit us – do not worry! Email: wtp@agh.edu.pl. Phone number: +48 12 617 57 42. If you have troubles with finding the correct article – use our help center or chatbot. Just type in your question and all the necessary links will pop up!
Read more..
